AIMSICD Android IMSI-Catcher Detector Device Details Map Viewer Database Viewer Signal strength Quit OK Cancel I Agree I Disagree
GSM Phones Only
DISCLAIMER By using AIMSICD you have understood and agree that AIMSICD is an experimental and informative Android application that can fail to detect surveillance and tracking for many reasons. You also understand that it can be circumvented or defeated by other means, not yet understood to the developers. Thus you also agree and understand that the developers and companies related to this free product, can in no way be held responsible for any results or outcome, depending on the use of this application.

Device Information SIM Information Network Information Cell Information Neighbouring Cells Ciphering Indicator Total: Country: Operator ID: Operator Name: IMSI: Serial: Phone Type: IMEI: RIL Version: Line Number: Provider Name: Provider Code: Type: LAC: CID: Data Activity: Data Status: Roaming: TA (LTE): Refresh Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer PSC:
About AIMSICD Version: Android IMSI-Catcher Detector (AIMSICD) Android-based project to detect and avoid fake base stations (IMSI-Catchers) in GSM/UMTS Networks. AIMSICD-Project on GitHub Full Documentation (WIKI) Anonymous Donations THIS IS A PoC DISCLAIMER RELEASES CHANGELOG LICENSE CREDITS https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/wiki https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Proof_of_concept https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/blob/master/DISCLAIMER https://secupwn.github.io/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/ http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1422969 https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/releases https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/blob/master/LICENSE https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/blob/master/CREDITS https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/wiki/Status-Icons https://github.com/SecUpwN/Android-IMSI-Catcher-Detector/wiki/Anonymous-Donations
Network ID: System ID: Base Station ID: Longitude: Latitude:
Location Services Disabled You cannot track GPS data without enabling Location Services. Enable them now?
System Settings Auto Start pref_autostart Automatically start service on boot Persistent Service pref_persistservice_service Service will continue to run after exiting the application (uncheck to fully close) Protection Settings pref_enable_cell Cell Tracking Enable Automatic Cell Tracking FemtoCell Detection (currently CDMA Phones ONLY) pref_femto_detection FemtoCell Protection pref_femto_action Enforce Airplane Mode when FemtoCell detected (re-enable network manually) Interface Settings Icons pref_ui_icons Icon Theme Selection Hello blank fragment SettingActivity Hello world! Settings map_pref_type disclaimer_accepted pref_refresh Refresh Rate Control the frequency of device updates pref_last_db_backup_version OpenCellID Settings pref_ocid_upload Contribute Cell Data Contribute data to the OpenCellID Project (NO personal information will ever be submitted without notice) pref_cell_table_cleansed pref_ocid_key OpenCellID API Key Enter your OpenCellID API Key here data_last_lat_lon pref_enable_cell_monitoring Cell Monitoring Enable Automatic Cell Monitoring Request API Key Request a new API key for OpenCellId
Map Viewer Preferences pref_map_type Map Type Display Map in different styles

Silent SMS Intercepted Silent SMS Message has been intercepted! \n\nDetails are available through the Database Viewer. Table contains no data to display.
OpenCellID API Key Click Ok to request an API key from OpenCellID.org. This will enable you to download their data and view it in the map. It will also enable you to upload cell data. Note that if you do not upload cell data within 20 days, your API key may become inactive. Error getting key: Saved new API key Debug Logs
